Header.heading: About

offer.title: I want to lease a flat
offer.description: Identify yourself on one of our points and start renting

co-housing.title: Co-housing

Start-Renting.title: List your property
Start-Renting.description: Interested in listing your property? Here are all the needed steps

What-Do-I-Need.title: What do I need?
What-Do-I-Need.description: To list properties on our platform, you need to verify yourself on of our checkpoints. Make sure to bring your ID, so we can verify your identity.

What-To-Do-After.title: What to do after?
What-To-Do-After.description: Right after you are verified, you can list your property!

Messages.verified: Your account is verified, you can list your properties!
Messages.unverified: Your account is not verified, but you can change that! Just follow the steps mentioned above
Messages.new-listing-redirect: You can create a listing here
Messages.unauthenticated: You are not logged in, therefore we cannot determine your current session.
